ArgumentError.invalidType@proto: 'type' argument must be of type non-empty string, value: {{-type,valueType}}
ArgumentError.invalidType@hades: ~[type] argument must be of type non-empty ~{string}, value {{-type,valueType@hades}}
ArgumentError.invalidTypes@proto: 'types' argument must be of type string or an instance of Array, value: {{-types,valueType}}
ArgumentError.invalidTypes@hades: ~[types] argument must be of type string or an instance of ~{Array}, value {{-types,valueType@hades}}
ArgumentError.invalidDirConfig@proto: 'dirConfig' argument must be of type string, value: {{-dirConfig,valueType}}
ArgumentError.invalidDirConfig@hades: ~[dirConfig] argument must be of type string, value {{-dirConfig,valueType@hades}}

forbiddenSet@proto: modify configs in memory is not allowed, key: {{key}}, value: {{-value,valueType}}
forbiddenSet@hades: modify configs in memory is not allowed, key {{key,value@hades}}}, value {{-value,valueType@hades}}
